MWC.GUI.SplitPanel

Class BeanPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • MWC.GUI.SplitPanel.BeanPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SplitPanel

    public class BeanPanel
extends java.awt.Panel
    Convenient Panel to use as a superclass for JavaBean views and controls - subdispatches focus, key and mouse events - manages action listeners - manages tab/focus awareness
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
